version_description:
* Native support for new devices (iPhone 5, new iPod Touch)
* Fixed bugs for iOS 6 users

Thanks for playing!

- Discontinued support for OpenFeint in favor of Game Center
- Minor tweaks and bug fixes

Thanks for playing!
Fixed a bug for iOS 6 users when the orientation of the home button is on the left.
Fixed bug for iPad users running iOS 5.x

- Fixed startup crash for some users

Thanks for playing!

- New Rewards! Pocket Change and Kiip are now fully supported.

- Numerous bug fixes

New in v1.1:

- Improved 3GS performance
- Added iTunes integration for OS 3.x users
- OpenFeint 2.2
- Minor bug fixes

- All new game modes
- Game Center
- Retina + iPad support
- Brand new interface
- Many other improvements

- Added Classic Mode
- Tweaked gameplay in Time Trial and made it easier to unlock Survival
- Added option to play original music
- Added option for inverted tilt controls
- More achievements added
- Several bug fixes and enhancements
New In-App purchases are now available!
Removed Pocket Change and Kiip from the game

Added a link to my new game, Kayos!
Minor bug fixes

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

Fixed graphics bug for non-retina iPad displays

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

Fixed graphics bug for non-retina iPad displays
